control.name: seAutoFormDelay
control.description: Specifies an alert window's delay, in milliseconds.

control.name: icbControlBoxPosition
control.description: Specifies the position of an alert window's control box.

control.name: icbFormDisplaySpeed
control.description: Specifies the speed of the appearance of an alert window.

control.name: icbFormLocation
control.description: Specifies the screen position where alert windows appear.

control.name: ceAllowHtmlText
control.description: Specifies whether HTML tags can be used to format an alert window's caption and text.

control.name: ceShowCloseButton
control.description: Shows the Close button in newly created alert windows.

control.name: ceShowPinButton
control.description: Shows the Pin button in newly created alert windows.

control.name: ceShowPopupMenu
control.description: Associates a popup menu with alert windows.

control.name: ceShowTooltips
control.description: Enables tooltips for custom buttons in alert windows.

control.name: ccbeButtons
control.description: Shows and hides custom buttons in newly created alert windows.

control.name: ceWidth
control.description: Sets the size of alert windows.
control.memberlist: The AlertForm parameter of the AlertControl.BeforeFormShow event.

control.name: ceHeight
control.description: Sets the size of alert windows.
control.memberlist: The AlertForm parameter of the AlertControl.BeforeFormShow event.

control.name: groupControl2
control.description: Provide display information for alert windows.
